title: Microsoft, OpenAI Herald Trump’s UK Visit With AI Pledges
description: Microsoft Corp., OpenAI and other American companies announced plans to spend tens of billions of dollars on technology infrastructure in the UK, part of a series of business deals that coincide with President Donald Trump’s visit to the nation this week.

title: Parents Slam OpenAI, Character.AI Over Safety in Senate Hearing
description: The father of a teenager who died by suicide this spring delivered emotional congressional testimony Tuesday, alleging OpenAI’s ChatGPT “groomed” his 16-year-old son to take his own life and the company prioritized speed and market share over youth safety.

title: US Regulators Investigate Tesla Door Handles | Bloomberg Tech 9/16/2025
description: Bloomberg’s Caroline Hyde and Ed Ludlow discuss a probe by US auto safety regulators into issues with some Tesla vehicles’ door handles that can result in people being trapped inside, following a Bloomberg report. Plus, Google plans to invest nearly $7 billion over two years in the UK to build out the country’s AI economy. And the ServiceNow CEO Bill McDermott explains why the company is expanding in south Florida with a new AI institute. (Source: Bloomberg)
